examples.korean: A young girl was in the line of fire. 발음듣기 어린 소녀 하나가 사선(射線) 안에 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: Be careful to stay out of the line of fire. 발음듣기 사선에 들어서지 않도록 조심해. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Be careful to stay out of the line of fire. 발음

examples.korean: The generals were never in the line of fire. 발음듣기 장군들은 결코 사선에 있지 않았다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
